edu.asu.beastd

Class CouchToSqlite

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.asu.beastd.CouchToSqlite

  • public class CouchToSqlite
extends java.lang.Object
    The CouchToSqlite class can take in a SQLite file location and/or CouchDB database location in its constructor and successfully convert CouchDB into relational SQLite databases.

    If no CouchDB instance is specified in the constructor, the class defaults to localhost:5984, and if no output file is specified, it defaults to "TestDB.db" as a location.
    Author:
    Team BEASTD

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CouchToSqlite()

      Constructor for a specific SQLite .db file output location and default CouchDB location (localhost:5984).
      CouchToSqlite(java.lang.String couchHost, int couchPort)
      Constructor for default SQLite location ("TestDB.db") and a specific CouchDB location.
      CouchToSqlite(java.lang.String dbPath, java.lang.String couchHost, int couchPort)
      Constructor for a specific SQLite .db file output location and specific CouchDB location.

        Parameters:
        couchHost - The host location of the CouchDB instance
